Subscription products have a localized [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/description] property that you can conditionally display in your custom style. Use the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/descriptionVisibility] property to check the value that the  [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/productDescription(_:)] view modifier configures on an ancestor of the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreView].

Ignore this property if your style doesn’t need the capability to conditionally display the product description. For example, a compact control style may never show product descriptions.

# descriptionVisibility

**Instance Property**

The visibility of product descriptions.

## Declaration

```swift
let descriptionVisibility: Visibility
```

## Discussion

Subscription products have a localized [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/description] property that you can conditionally display in your custom style. Use the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/descriptionVisibility] property to check the value that the  [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/productDescription(_:)] view modifier configures on an ancestor of the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreView].

Ignore this property if your style doesn’t need the capability to conditionally display the product description. For example, a compact control style may never show product descriptions.

If the view heirarachy doesn’t use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/productDescription(_:)] view modifier, the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/descriptionVisibility] property is [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyle/automatic].
